Package sendEmail

Class SendEmail

  • java.lang.Object
    • sendEmail.SendEmail
  • @Named
@RequestScoped
public class SendEmail
extends java.lang.Object
    SendEmail class is used to send a email to the user's mail ID whenever he sets up a game. Used to send email to both the team coach's email ID about the confirmation of the game.
    Author:
    raghul
